title: League new patcher makes the percentage get stuck at 75% and goes down slower and slower.
body: The new patch got me to 75% and keeps getting lower and tells me i have to wait even longer! Help please @riotsupport

replies.body: If you haven't been getting any errors so far, it might just be that your patcher was in the process of actually updating the files after it had downloaded everything. If you do start seeing any error messages, try to grab a screenshot and shoot them my way so I can see exactly what was going wrong.
